mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (userid, password, nickname, name, email, enabled, authority,emailauth, point, lastdate, date) VALUES (#{userid}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name},#{email},1, 'ROLE_USER','N' ,0 ,now(),now())

INSERT INTO tbl_member (userid, password, nickname, name, email, enabled, authority,emailauth,provider,providerid ,point, lastdate, date) VALUES (#{userid}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name},#{email},1, 'ROLE_USER','Y',#{provider} ,#{providerid} ,0 ,now(),now())
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET emailauth = 'Y' WHERE userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select userid from tbl_member where name=#{name} and email = #{email} and provider is NULL
